Concept: Understand the Mind and Body of the Language
Information:
Knowing the logical structure of the language makes easier to understand the language. 
Sustained Efforts: Studying, Memorizing and or Learning does support the progression of grasping the language.

Concept: Feel the Soul of the Language
Information:
Let the language flow into your soul with massive inputs through reading and listening.
Natural Selection: Grow the language into you by letting yourself absorb the contextual meaning of each statements.

Create an environment and/or live by your target language in order to fast track your familiarization, recognition, recall abilities and be accustomed to it in no time. 
Input: Massive inputs in target language through reading and listening. 
Output: Mental processing are faster when you are accustomed to the language.

To facilitate easy and faster language acquisition, making the input comprehensible is the key.  
Some level of understanding may be set in order to grasp the language more effectively and efficiently. 
Input: Make the input comprehensible. Learning on the fly. 
Output: Mental processing and communication skills can be improved when you imitate and put it into practice.
